title: Need help identifying this font?
content:
Anyone know the name of the font used in "Mozak's"

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418193840im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DEFAULT_S1203587187_large_4784.jpg)
author: flophouse85

comments.content: Friz Quadrata with a pseudo-italicization and extending

I think it's the bold weight: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/friz-quadrata/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418193840/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/friz-quadrata/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/friz-quadrata/")

I believe there is also a black weight, maybe I'm wrong
